photo module¶

Handler for retrieving uploaded photos for display.

Bases: photo.PhotoError

message = <django.utils.functional.__proxy__ object>¶
photo.create_photo(image, handler)¶

Creates a new Photo entity for the provided image of type images.Image after resizing it and converting to PNG. It may throw a PhotoError on failure, which comes with a localized error message appropriate for display.

photo.get_photo_url(photo, handler)¶

Returns the URL where this app is serving a hosted Photo object.
